name: gatsby-markdown-api-example
description: Gatsby example with markdown files from API and multiple templates

scripts.build:full: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build:with-api: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start-api" "npm run build:full"
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.test:build: concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run start-api" "sleep 5 && npm run build:full"
